rules_text:
Heliconfluence deals 5 damage to target creature, planeswalker, or opponent. When a permanent dealt damage by Heliconfluence this turn dies, create a 5/5 Elemental creature token with flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, and lifelink that’s all colors.
Overload {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change “target” in its text to “each.”)[/i]
